## Set-Up

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# load packages
library(ggplot2)
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
```

## Load in Land Cover

```{r}
# use raster package to interpret .img file
NLCD <- raster::raster("NLCD_2019/NLCD_2019_Land_Cover_Science_Product_L48_20210604.img")

# raster::plot(NLCD) is returning - "Error in setValues(outras, m) : values must be numeric, logical or factor"
```

## Load in Delaware Bay NHD Plus

```{r}
# look at the list of files in the geodatabase
# rdgal is the package needed for .gdb files
ogrListLayers("delaware_bay_NHD+.gdb")
```
